name: Cute Car Decoration
description:
Hey girls! Check out this super fun decoration game I have here just for you, it's about decorating your first car.
So, let's see what we have here: lots of candy colors to paint your car with, funny stickers, my favorite is definitely that lovely bee, animal prints and other funny designs for your car that are available in this game.
there is more but you'll have to discover alone, by getting my trendy car decoration game started. Just give one click on each category and choose from a wide variety of colors and accessories the ones you like best of all and customize your first car exactly as you want.
